original_text: He accuses her that she is bad. He says, “I discovered that your daughter had sex before I married her.” But look at her cloth. This shows that she had never had sex before.’ Then her parents must hold the cloth in front of the leaders of the town.
korean_text: 비방거리를 만들어 말하기를 내가 네 딸에게서 처녀임을 보지 못하였노라 하나 보라 내 딸의 처녀의 표적이 이것이라 하고 그 부모가 그 자리옷을 그 성읍 장로들 앞에 펼 것이요

sentences.original_text: He accuses her that she is bad.
"I discovered that your daughter had sex before I married her."
sentences.korean_translation: "내가 그녀와 결혼하기 전에 네 딸이 성관계를 가졌음을 발견했다."

sentences.original_text: This shows that she had never had sex before.'
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 그녀가 이전에 결혼하지 않았음을 보여줍니다.'

sentences.original_text: Then her parents must hold the cloth
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그녀의 부모는 그 옷을 들어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: in front of the leaders of the town.
